AT.name: Wave Race™ 64
AT.description: Fahre deinen Kawasaki Jet-Ski gegen erbitterte Konkurrenten und stürmische Wellen zum Sieg. Dies ist eines der prägenden Nintendo 64™-Rennspiele, da durch die beeindruckende Fahrphysik eine neue Art des Videospielerlebnisses gezeigt wurde, die nur mit 3D Game-Engines möglich war. Selbst heute bleibt die originelle herangehensweise an das Renn-Genre, mit Bojen, die von rechts oder links passiert werden müssen, sowie einem Power-Up-System, das geschickte Rennfahrer belohnt, eine spaßige und erfrischende Herausforderung, welche du alleine oder auch mit einem Freund erleben kannst. Wenn du diesen Titel bereits auf deiner Wii™ erworben hast, führe einen System-Transfer von deiner Wii auf deine Wii U™ durch, um ein Upgrade-Sonderangebot zu erhalten. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AU.name: Wave Race™ 64
AU.description: Ride your Kawasaki jet ski to victory against fierce rivals and tumultuous waves. This is one of the defining racing games of the Nintendo 64™ as its impressive physics showed a new kind of experience that could only be possible with 3D game engines. Even today, its original take on racing, with buoys to pass from either their right or left side and a power-up system rewarding skilful racers, remains a fun and fresh challenge to enjoy by yourself or with a friend. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

BG.name: Wave Race™ 64
BG.description: Ride your Kawasaki jet ski to victory against fierce rivals and tumultuous waves. This is one of the defining racing games of the Nintendo 64™ as its impressive physics showed a new kind of experience that could only be possible with 3D game engines. Even today, its original take on racing, with buoys to pass from either their right or left side and a power-up system rewarding skilful racers, remains a fun and fresh challenge to enjoy by yourself or with a friend. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

BE.name: Wave Race™ 64
BE.description: Menez votre jet-ski Kawasaki à la victoire en affrontant des concurrents redoutables et des vagues tumultueuses. Voici l'un des jeux de course caractéristiques de la Nintendo 64™. Sa configuration impressionnante qui permet de vivre un nouveau genre d'expérience n'est possible que sur les consoles de jeu 3D. Même aujourd'hui, la course originale, avec des bouées à contourner par la gauche ou par la droite et un système de power up récompensant les concurrents les plus talentueux, reste un défi drôle et agréable, à apprécier seul ou entre amis. Si vous possédez ce titre sur votre Wii, faites un transfert Wii™ vers votre Wii U™ afin d'obtenir la version améliorée à un prix spécial ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

CA.name: Wave Race™ 64
CA.description: Choose one of four characters, each with his or her own unique abilities and style, and master the game’s excellent controls. Make your way through nine courses, each with its own challenges. If the ramps, mines, and hairpin turns aren’t enough, you’ll also have to deal with varying weather conditions that can make the water choppy or cover the course with fog. Take a break from racing to try the Stunt Mode. Polish your skills pulling off handstands, rolls, flips, and more!

Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

ES.name: Wave Race™ 64
ES.description: Conduce tu moto acuática Kawasaki hasta la victoria mientras te enfrentas a temibles rivales y a agitadas olas. Este es uno de los mejores juegos de carreras de Nintendo 64™, pues su impresionante física dio a conocer un nuevo tipo de experiencia que solo es posible gracias a los motores de juego en 3D. Incluso hoy en día, su estilo de carreras original, con boyas que esquivar por la derecha o la izquierda y un sistema de refuerzo que premia a los pilotos más habilidosos, sigue siendo un reto divertido y original que puedes disfrutar por tu cuenta o con un amigo. Si posees este título en tu Wii™, puedes realizar una transferencia de datos de Wii a Wii U™ y obtener una actualización a un precio especial. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

IT.name: Wave Race™ 64
IT.description: Guida la tua moto d'acqua Kawasaki verso la vittoria, sfidando rivali agguerriti e onde tumultuose. Questo è uno dei migliori giochi di corsa per Nintendo 64™, diventato popolare grazie alle sue simulazioni di fisica che hanno fatto conoscere un nuovo tipo di esperienza di gioco, possibile allora solo con motori di gioco 3D. Ancora oggi il suo approccio originale al genere della corsa, con boe da schivare o dal lato destro o da quello sinistro e un sistema di potenziamento che premia i piloti più abili, rimane una sfida divertente e originale da affrontare per conto proprio o con gli amici. Se possiedi questo titolo sulla tua console Wii™, effettua un trasferimento dati su Wii U™ per potere ottenere la versione ottimizzata a un prezzo speciale! Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

MX.name: Wave Race™ 64
MX.description: Elige entre cuatro personajes, cada uno con diferentes habilidades y estilo y domina los impresionantes controles del juego. Corre a través de nueve pistas, cada una con diferentes desafíos. Como si tener que superar rampas, minas y curvas cerradas no fuera suficiente, también tendrás que abrirte camino a través de condiciones climáticas que podrían agitar el mar o cubrir el camino de niebla. Tómate un descanso de las carreras y visita el modo Stunt Mode. ¡Muestra tus habilidades realizando giros, volteretas y más!

NO.name: Wave Race™ 64
NO.description: Ride your Kawasaki jet ski to victory against fierce rivals and tumultuous waves. This is one of the defining racing games of the Nintendo 64™ as its impressive physics showed a new kind of experience that could only be possible with 3D game engines. Even today, its original take on racing, with buoys to pass from either their right or left side and a power-up system rewarding skilful racers, remains a fun and fresh challenge to enjoy by yourself or with a friend. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

NL.name: Wave Race™ 64
NL.description: Race je Kawasaki jetski naar de overwinning tegen uitdagende tegenstanders en woeste golven. Dit is een van de bepalende racespellen van de Nintendo 64™ doordat de indrukwekkende physics een nieuwe spelervaring introduceerde die alleen mogelijk was met 3D game engines. Tot op de dag van vandaag blijft de originele benadering van racen, met boeien waar je óf links, óf rechts langs moet en een power-up systeem dat goede racers beloont, een leuke en vernieuwende uitdaging om alleen of met vrienden te spelen. Als je deze titel hebt gekocht op je Wii™, kom je in aanmerking voor een speciale upgrade-prijs als je je gegevens overzet van Wii naar Wii U™. Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

NZ.name: Wave Race™ 64
NZ.description: Ride your Kawasaki jet ski to victory against fierce rivals and tumultuous waves. This is one of the defining racing games of the Nintendo 64™ as its impressive physics showed a new kind of experience that could only be possible with 3D game engines. Even today, its original take on racing, with buoys to pass from either their right or left side and a power-up system rewarding skilful racers, remains a fun and fresh challenge to enjoy by yourself or with a friend. PL.name: Wave Race™ 64
PL.description: Ride your Kawasaki jet ski to victory against fierce rivals and tumultuous waves. Even today, its original take on racing, with buoys to pass from either their right or left side and a power-up system rewarding skilful racers, remains a fun and fresh challenge to enjoy by yourself or with a friend. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Wave Race™ 64
PT.description: Conduz a tua mota de água Kawasaki até à vitória contra rivais aguerridos e ondas crispadas. Este é um dos melhores jogos de corridas da Nintendo 64™, com as suas impressionantes simulações de física a trazerem uma nova experiência que apenas se tornou possível com motores de jogo a 3D. Mesmo hoje em dia, a sua abordagem original ao jogo de corridas, com bóias para passar pela direita ou pela esquerda e um sistema de power-ups que recompensa os pilotos mais hábeis, continua a ser um desafio divertido para ser desfrutado a solo ou com um amigo. Caso já tenha adquirido este título para a sua Wii, faça uma transferência de dados da sua Wii™ para a sua Wii U™ com atualizações a um preço especial. Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

RU.name: Wave Race™ 64
RU.description: Садитесь за руль вашего водного мотоцикла Kawasaki и отправляйтесь в путь к победе, Это одна из гоночных игр для системы Nintendo 64™, которая показала, на что способны трехмерные игровые движки, выводя впечатления от игр на совершенно новый уровень благодаря их захватывающей физике. Даже на сегодняшний день, оригинальное представление этой игры о гонках — с возможностью объезда буев как слева, так и справа, а также с ее системой бонусов, вознаграждающей опытных гонщиков — позволяет игроку весело проводить время в одиночку или же с другом. Если вы приобрели игру на Wii™, вы можете передать ее на консоль Wii U™ и получить скидку на обновление игры до версии Wii U. Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.

This is one of the defining racing games of the Nintendo 64™ as its impressive physics showed a new kind of experience that could only be possible with 3D game engines.
